6.title: Lock the F*cking Door: Fionna

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Roommate (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

6.plot: Eve's mantra is mi casa es su casa. Fionna just wants the front door to stay locked. When the Wolfman arrives one night, only one roommate will survive to tell the tale.

7.title: House Guests: Tyronne

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Roommate (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

7.plot: Tyrone is new to the house, but it isn't long before he discovers his roommate, Jordan - and his many "dates" - have left them both itching. "House Guest" takes on a whole new meaning in a quest to find the biting culprit.

8.title: House Guests: Jordan

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Roommate (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

9.title: Bano Occupado: Jen

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Roommate (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

9.plot: Meet Jen and Emma. Jen's an early riser with a corporate gig, but no matter how early she wakes up, Emma-the-Slob, always beats her to the shower. How many times can Jen run late for work before she breaks the bathroom door down?

imdb.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Roommate
akas: 50 Ways to Kill Your Roommate (United States)
plot: There are two sides to every story - witness the final warning to dirty dishes, missing food, ruined 'borrowed' clothes, and relish the justice of vengeance.
